Source code for kidvm.models

from kidvm import app

db = SQLAlchemy(app)

#===============================================================================
class User(db.Model):
    """The User object

[docs]    """
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    email = db.Column(db.String(250), unique=True)
    password = db.Column(db.String(50))
    created = db.Column(db.DateTime)
    account_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('account.id'))

    
#===============================================================================
class Account(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)


[docs]    name = db.Column(db.String(50), unique=True)
    plan_key = db.Column(db.String(50), default='BASIC')
    is_active = db.Column(db.Boolean)
    created = db.Column(db.DateTime)
    user = db.relationship('User', backref='user', lazy='dynamic', uselist=False)
    kids = db.relationship('Kid', backref='kid', lazy='dynamic')
    categories = db.relationship('Category', backref='category', lazy='dynamic')

    
#===============================================================================
class Kid(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)


[docs]    account_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('account.id'))
    name = db.Column(db.String(100))
    birthday = db.Column(db.DateTime)
    opening_balance = db.Column(db.Float)
    is_active = db.Column(db.Boolean)
    created = db.Column(db.DateTime)
    allowances = db.relationship('Allowance', backref='allowance', lazy='dynamic')

    
#===============================================================================
class Allowance(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)


[docs]    kid_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('kid.id'))
    period = db.Column(db.String(20))
    period_day = db.Column(db.Integer)
    amount = db.Column(db.Float)
    is_active = db.Column(db.Boolean)
    created = db.Column(db.DateTime)
    transactions = db.relationship('Transaction', backref='transaction', lazy='dynamic')

    
#===============================================================================
class Category(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)


[docs]    name = db.Column(db.String(150))
    account_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('account.id'))
    transactions = db.relationship('Transaction', backref='transaction', lazy='dynamic')

    
#===============================================================================
class Transaction(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)


[docs]    kid_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('kid.id'))
    transaction_date = db.Column(db.DateTime)
    amount = db.Column(db.Float)
    category_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('category.id'))
    description = db.Column(db.Text)
    allowance_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('allowance.id'))
    modified = db.Column(db.DateTime)
    created = db.Column(db.DateTime)
